process_details.description: The Manage Contract business process monitors contractor performance, processes contract amendments, manages contract renewals, and ensures compliance with contract terms and conditions. The process includes tracking deliverables, monitoring performance measures, and managing contract modifications.
results: Tracking information as needed for measuring performance and business activity monitoring.
process_steps: Monitor contractor performance against contract requirements.
If applicable, process contract amendment request.
shared_data: Contractor data store including contract information
process_details.constraints: Contract management must comply with state and federal regulations.
failures: Contractor fails to meet performance requirements.
performance_measures: Time to process amendment = ___ days; ___ weeks
